forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 62F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 18C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 64F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 18C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 64F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 19C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 66F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High around 20C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 67F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High around 20C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 68F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 64F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 51F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 18C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 64F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High around 65F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 19C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 66F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
